narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Excel Home Health Care is a Chore Provider provider based in St. Louis, MO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $24.3M in Medicaid payments across 333K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $24.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
